message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, as I believe it's fair considering the potential inflation effects.

I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. While I understand your concerns about inflation, I believe this split reflects a more balanced distribution considering the risks of further inflation in the future.
Considering the inflation risk, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a balance between our shares while accounting for the potential decrease in value over time.
